Subject: RFE: Make excluded.properties extensible
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: Mike Morris <mike.morris@...>

Apologies if I have missed something in the docs;  I would like to see 
excluded.properties be extensible so that I can add to (or override) the list of 
packages/classes that are excluded from reloading behaviour.  As far as I can 
tell from perusing the source the "excluded.properties" file is only looked-for 
in the classpath.

Does anyone else feel that it would be useful to be able to add one's own list 
of packages for exclusion?  Perhaps such properties could simply be added to 
junit.properties rather than creating another, separate config file.
--

subject: RFE: Make excluded.properties extensible
